title: BUSINESS_HOURS_DIFF
description: Calculates the difference in milliseconds between two Datetime values within business hours. Uses the default schedule if none is provided.

parameters.name: business_hours_name_optional
parameters.description: The name of the business hours.

examples:
BUSINESS_HOURS_DIFF(CreatedDate, ClosedDate)
-- Returns milliseconds of default business hours between record creation and closure

BUSINESS_HOURS_DIFF(Case_Created__c, First_Response__c, "SupportSchedule")
-- Returns milliseconds of "SupportSchedule" hours between case creation and first response
